level.heading: Prior Codifications
level.text: Temporary Repeal of Section For temporary (225 day) repeal of section, see § 4(i) of Human Services Spending Reduction Temporary Amendment Act of 1995 (D.C. Law 11-29, July 25, 1995, law notification 42 DCR 4002).

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary repeal of section, see § 4(i) of the Human Services Spending Reduction Emergency Amendment Act of 1995 (D.C. Act 11-35, April 11, 1995, 42 DCR 1834), § 4(i) of the Human Services Spending Reduction Congressional Recess Emergency Amendment Act of 1995 (D.C. Act 11-104, July 21, 1995, 42 DCR 4014), and § 506(y) of the Omnibus Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 1995 (D.C. Act 11-124, July 27, 1995, 42 DCR 4160).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-137
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-137, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-1301.02.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-52
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-52, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-1301.02.
